title: Will OJ Simpson go free? Nancy takes your calls!
itunes:title: Will OJ Simpson go free? Nancy takes your calls!
description:
OJ Simpson's parole hearing could result in freedom from a Nevada prison for the infamous actor/athlete. Nancy Grace's guest to discuss Simpson's chances are reporter Art Harris, psychologist Caryn Stark and YOU! This episode features calls from listeners commenting and asking questions about OJ.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
